name: Soul Alloy Tools
description: It turns out that $(l:conjuring:basics/soul_composite_materials#soul_alloy)Soul Alloy$() makes for formidable tools when applied on top of $(item)Netherite$() using a $(l:conjuring:rituals/ritual_of_weaving)Soul Weaver$(). What these implements can accomplish and how they may be refined is outlined in these pages.
